name: DBGp-client
description:
This is a small modification of Ethan McCreadie's version, itself a modification of 
Seung Woo Shin's XDebug remote debugger: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2218

It fixes a bug I encountered when adding a breakpoint to a remote file on a local mount.
install_details: Just untar these files and place them in your .vim/plugin directory.
